import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { BASE_URL } from '../Services/baseurl'; import { addcontext } from '../Components/ContextShare'; import Header from '../Components/Header' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; function Addcart() { const { addthings } = useContext(addcontext); return ( <>
{addthings.length > 0 ? ( addthings.map((book) => (
Book Name: {book.bookname}
Author: {book.author}
Price: {book.price}
)) ) : (

Cart Empty

)}
Card Title Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.
); } export default Addcart;
